00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00042 EnvelopeLibrary::EnvelopeLibrary () { }
00043 
00044 
00045 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00046 EnvelopeLibrary::~EnvelopeLibrary ()
00047 {
00048   while (library.size () )
00049     delete library.remove (0);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00054 EnvelopeLibrary::EnvelopeLibrary (EnvelopeLibrary & lib)
00055 {
00056   for (int envs = 0; envs < lib.library.size (); envs++)
00057     library.add (lib.library.get (envs)->clone() );
00058 }
00059

00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00062 EnvelopeLibrary & EnvelopeLibrary::operator= (EnvelopeLibrary & lib)
00063 {
00064   if (&lib != this)
00065     {
00066       // delete old data
00067       while (library.size () )
00068         delete library.remove (0);
00069 
00070       // reassign new data
00071       for (int envs = 0; envs < lib.library.size (); envs++)
00072         library.add (lib.library.get (envs) );
00073     }
00074   
00075   return * this;
00076 }

00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00080 bool EnvelopeLibrary::saveLibrary (char * filename)
00081 {
00082   Envelope * temp_env;
00083   Collection <xy_point> * temp_coll;
00084 
00085   if (library.size () == 0) // empty library?
00086     return false;
00087  
00088   ofstream outData (filename, ios::out); // open an output stream
00089 
00090   if (!outData)
00091     {
00092       cerr << "ERROR: file could not be written.\n";
00093       outData.close ();
00094       return false;
00095     }
00096 
00097   else 
00098     {
00099       outData.setf (ios::left, ios::adjustfield); // format left for setw
00100 
00101         outData << library.size () << "\n\n"; // write number of envelopes
00102 
00103       for (int envs = 0; envs < library.size (); envs++)
00104         {
00105           temp_env = library.get (envs);
00106           temp_coll = temp_env -> getPoints ();
00107 
00108           outData << setw(10) << "Envelope" << setw(10) << (envs + 1) << "\n"; // envelope index number
00109 
00110           outData << (temp_coll -> size () ) << "\n"; // number of points
00111 
00112           for (int pts = 0; pts < ( (temp_coll -> size () ) - 1); pts++)
00113             {
00114               // write point data for this envelope
00115               // format: point nx, point ny
00116               outData << setw(10) << (temp_coll -> get(pts).x)
00117                       << setw(10) << (temp_coll -> get(pts).y);
00118               
00119               // write segment data for this envelope
00120               // format: interpolation_type n, time_type n, time_value n
00121               
00122               // interpolation type
00123               if ((temp_env -> getSegmentInterpolationType (pts)) == LINEAR)
00124                 outData << setw(15) << "LINEAR";
00125               else if ((temp_env -> getSegmentInterpolationType (pts)) == EXPONENTIAL)
00126                 outData << setw(15) << "EXPONENTIAL";
00127               else if ((temp_env -> getSegmentInterpolationType (pts)) == CUBIC_SPLINE)
00128                 outData << setw(15) << "CUBIC_SPLINE";
00129               
00130               // length type
00131               if (temp_env -> getSegmentLengthType (pts) == FLEXIBLE )
00132                 outData << setw(10) << "FLEXIBLE";
00133               else
00134                 outData << setw(10) << "FIXED";
00135               
00136               // time value, not actually used
00137               outData << setw(10) << (temp_env -> getSegmentLength (pts) ) << "\n"; 
00138             }
00139           // write the last set of points: point (n + 1)x, point (n + 1)y
00140           outData << setw(10) << (temp_coll -> get ( (temp_coll -> size () ) - 1).x)
00141                   << setw(10) << (temp_coll -> get ( (temp_coll -> size () ) - 1).y) 
00142                   << "\n\n";
00143 
00144         }
00145       outData.close ();
00146     }
00147 
00148   return true;
00149 }

00152 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00153 int EnvelopeLibrary::loadLibrary (char * filename)
00154 {
00155   int count_envs, count_pts, count_segs, env_number;
00156   float xpt, ypt, iTemp;
00157   char cTemp [10];
00158   interpolation_type intyp;
00159   stretch_type tstyp;
00160   m_time_type timev;
00161   xy_point point;
00162   envelope_segment segment;
00163   Collection <xy_point> env_points;
00164   Collection <envelope_segment> env_segments;
00165   Envelope * temp_env;
00166 
00167   ifstream inData (filename, ios::in); // open an input stream
00168 
00169   if (!inData)
00170     {
00171       cerr << "ERROR: file could not be opened.\n";
00172       inData.close ();
00173       return -1;
00174     }
00175 
00176   else
00177     {
00178       inData >> count_envs; // read number of envelopes
00179 
00180       for (int envs = 0; envs < count_envs; envs++)
00181         {
00182           // clear temporary collections
00183           env_points.clear ();
00184           env_segments.clear ();
00185 
00186           inData >> cTemp; // envelope descriptor, discard
00187           inData >> env_number; // envelope number, discard
00188           inData >> count_pts; // number of points
00189 
00190           for (int pts = 0; pts < (count_pts - 1); pts++)
00191             {
00192               // read point data for this envelope
00193               // format: point nx, point ny
00194               inData >> xpt;
00195               inData >> ypt;
00196 
00197               point.x = xpt;
00198               point.y = ypt;
00199 
00200               env_points.add (point);
00201 
00202               // read segment data for this envelope
00203               // format: interpolation_type n, time_type n, time_value n
00204 
00205               // conversions for enumerated types
00206               inData >> cTemp;
00207               if ( strcmp(cTemp, "LINEAR") == 0 )
00208                 intyp = LINEAR;
00209               else if (strcmp(cTemp, "EXPONENTIAL") == 0)
00210                 intyp = EXPONENTIAL;
00211               else if (strcmp(cTemp,"CUBIC_SPLINE") == 0)
00212                 intyp = CUBIC_SPLINE;
00213              
00214               inData >> cTemp;
00215               if ( strcmp (cTemp, "FIXED" ) == 0)
00216                 tstyp = FIXED;
00217               else
00218                 tstyp = FLEXIBLE;
00219 
00220               inData >> timev;
00221 
00222               segment.interType = intyp;
00223               segment.lengthType = tstyp;
00224               segment.length = timev;
00225 
00226               env_segments.add (segment);
00227             }
00228           // read the last set of points: point (n + 1)x, point (n + 1)y 
00229           inData >> xpt;
00230           inData >> ypt;
00231 
00232           point.x = xpt;
00233           point.y = ypt;
00234 
00235           env_points.add (point);
00236 
00237           // construct a Envelope and add it to the library
00238           temp_env = new Envelope (env_points, env_segments);
00239           library.add (temp_env);
00240         }
00241 
00242       inData.close ();
00243     }
00244 
00245   return (library.size () );
00246 }

00249 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00250 Envelope * EnvelopeLibrary::getEnvelope (int index)
00251 {
00252   if (index > library.size () )
00253     return NULL;
00254   else
00255     return (library.get (index - 1) ) -> clone ();
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00260 int EnvelopeLibrary::addEnvelope (Envelope * env)
00261 {
00262   library.add (env);
00263   return (library.size () );
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00268 int EnvelopeLibrary::addEnvelope (Collection <xy_point> points,
00269                                   Collection <envelope_segment> segments)
00270 {
00271   Envelope * temp_env;
00272   temp_env = new Envelope (points, segments);
00273   return (addEnvelope (temp_env) );
00274 }

00277 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00278 bool EnvelopeLibrary::updateEnvelope (int index, Envelope * env)
00279 {
00280   if (index > library.size () )
00281     return false;
00282   else
00283     {
00284       library.set ( (index - 1), env);
00285       return true;
00286     }
00287 }

00290 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00291 void EnvelopeLibrary::showEnvelope (int index)
00292 {
00293   Envelope * temp_env;
00294   
00295   if (index > library.size () )
00296     return;
00297   else
00298     {
00299       temp_env = library.get (index - 1);
00300       temp_env -> Print ();
00301     }
00302 }

00305 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00306 int EnvelopeLibrary::size ()
00307 {
00308   return (library.size () );
